settings.title: Industry-Leading Expertise
settings.content: Every AAI instructor is hand-selected for their exceptional experience and commitment to safety education. Our faculty members have worked at major theme parks, served on industry committees, and hold advanced certifications in their specialized areas.

settings.list_items:
Advanced degrees in engineering, safety, or related fields
Active industry certifications and continuing education
Real-world experience at major amusement facilities
Commitment to current industry best practices

IAAPA (International Association of Amusement Parks and Attractions) members
ASTM F24 Committee participation
NAARSO (National Association of Amusement Ride Safety Officials) certification
State and federal inspection experience
